com.intuitiv.campus.dao

Interface Dao<T,PK extends java.io.Serializable>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - : the type of the object to access in the database
    PK - : the primary key of the object to access in the database
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDao, CampusDaoImpl, UserDaoImpl

    public interface Dao<T,PK extends java.io.Serializable>
    Dao is the public interface who describe the general DAO
    Author:
    Meidi

    • Method Summary

      Delete an object from the database

      Find an object identified by an ID in the database

      List every objects of the selected type from the data source

      Save an object in the data source
